entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

Temperature: 9.7°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 20 except 14 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 20 except 14 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
